backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing two-bidder auctions, including state, bidding logic, player sales, and auction lifecycle functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking an error‑message improvement to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all main frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theming for light/dark modes using an OKLCH color palette.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling navigation between setup, auction, and results screens.
frontend/src/components/auction/AuctionS: UI for live auction interactions including bidding, starting rounds, and error display using React Query.
frontend/src/components/auction/guards.t: Provides validation helpers for auction setup and bids, ensuring valid names, player lists, and bid amounts.
frontend/src/components/auction/ResultsS: Displays final bidder rosters, spending summaries, and full sales history after the auction ends.
frontend/src/components/auction/SetupScr: Form for entering bidder and player names and initializing a new auction.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with header navigation, footer, and screen switching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuctionQueries.ts: Wraps backend auction operations with React Query hooks for state fetching, initialization, bidding, and selling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and identity management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for the auction app’s light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into clean, user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for CR amounts, player status, and highest bidder display.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, existing features, new feature requests, and known issues for a 2‑bidder, 10‑player auction app. Highlights a bidding flow bug and tracks requirements for frontend and backend development.
